name: Chase The Chest Z
description:
Chase the chest  inspired from zelda MOM, tutorial and my imagination.

Made with Gb Studio 2.0 

2 versions available 

v1 = without camera helping ( so hard mode)

v1.1 = camera show where is the chest (so easy mode)

note : In the browser, you will play at the v1.1

------------------------------------

Use arrow to move Player

Use Z to interact with Rubies Bag
